name: Golden Sandal
description:
Golden Sandal takes you somewhere slow—somewhere sacred. The air is thick with spice and softened by light. You’ve just stepped barefoot onto warm earth, and the scent rising around you is woodsy, creamy, grounding.

Isn’t just a candle. It’s a ritual. A walk-through memory and myth, where sandalwood glows like gold dust in the air.

Poured by hand into a matte clear glass jar, Golden Sandal uses 100% natural soy wax and an unbleached cotton wick for a clean, long-lasting burn. Designed to accompany you through stillness, story, and the soft unraveling of the day.
features: Hand-poured in small batches using 100% soy wax
Unbleached cotton wick for a clean, even burn
Reusable tinted glass vessel—wipe clean and repurpose
Made to ground, calm, and cocoon your senses
mood: The golden hour in scent form. A slow, steady flame for grounding rituals, post-yoga stillness, or writing letters to your past self.

name: Gajray Bonds
description:
Gajray Bonds wraps you in nostalgia and nectar—like the feeling of leaning into someone you love who just came home from a wedding under moonlight. The scent is lush with night-blooming mogra—rich, white, and alive—twined with sheer rosewater and a whisper of vetiver on wet earth.

This is not just fragrance. It is the memory of silk, bangles, and whispers in the corridor. A garland made of stories.

Poured into a delicate pearl-toned glass jar and finished with an unbleached cotton wick, Gajray Bonds is a soy wax candle that burns clean, slow, and soft—just like the traditions it draws from.
notes: Top: Fresh Mogra (Jasmine Sambac), Neroli Petals
features: Clean-burning cotton wick—no toxins, no parabens
Elegant, reusable glass vessel in opalescent pearl
Inspired by Indian jasmine garlands—Gajra—worn to bind beauty and belonging
mood: A dusky courtyard filled with moonlight, anklets, laughter and intimacy. Gajray Bonds was made for evenings of slow dressing, storytelling, or letting your hair down—literally.

name: Lemon Crystals
description:
Lemon Crystals is not your mellow citrus—zesty, green, and full of momentum. It doesn't whisper in the background. It leads and lights clarity.

There’s something about this fragrance that clears the static. The moment the scent hits the air, the mind sharpens, the breath deepens. You feel more awake. If “fresh” had a backbone, this would be it. This is not a candle for background mood—it is the mood.

Housed in a polished citron-glass vessel, Lemon Crystals is a soy wax candle designed to wake the air up. Boldly herbal, sharply citrus, with edges like crystal facets—it brings focus, energy, and luminous calm.
notes: Top: Lemongrass, Kaffir Lime, Crushed Mint
Base: White Amber, Wet Basil, Frosted Musk
features: Hand-poured with an unbleached cotton wick
Sleek glass vessel in translucent citron yellow
Bold lemongrass-forward scent with an herbal backbone
mood: Think kitchen just scrubbed, thoughts just sorted, morning just started. Lemon Crystals doesn’t ask for attention. It commands it—quietly, beautifully, without apology.

name: Velvet Pearls
description:
Velvet Pearls is jasmine in its purest form—creamy, radiant, and unmistakably feminine. It doesn’t just scent the air. It wraps around you like silk slipping over skin.

This candle is an ode to moonlit walks, delicate rituals, and the kind of beauty that doesn’t try—it just is. It opens with the narcotic sweetness of Indian Jasmine Sambac, lifted by the airy brightness of neroli and a whisper of white peach.

Beneath that, creamy sandalwood and warm musk cradle the florals in a base that feels like second skin. Velvet Pearls is not loud. It lingers and glows.
notes: Top: White Jasmine, Neroli Blossom, White Peach
Heart: Jasmine Sambac, Magnolia, Tuberose Petal
Base: Creamy Sandalwood, Soft Musk, Orris Root
features: Hand-poured into a pearly blush frosted jar
mood: A handwritten letter on silk paper. A kiss just behind the ear. That moment before a secret is shared. Velvet Pearls doesn’t decorate the room—it elevates it. A scent for slow mornings, soft glances, and stories whispered without words.

name: Compose Your Set
description:
Some stories are too big for a single flame.

Whether it’s two souls stitched together by time, three wishes whispered into the dark, or four seasons of love lived out loud—this bundle is for the moments that ask for more. More warmth. More meaning.

Curate your own set from our signature candles—each one a love letter in wax.

Golden Sandal: Earthy sandalwood with a golden hush
Gajray Bonds: Intoxicating mogra, soft and ceremonial
Lemon Crystals: Zesty lemongrass, bold and untamed
Velvet Pearls: Jasmine’s delicate, eternal glow

Wrapped in elegance, ready to gift. For birthdays and soulmates. For apologies and beginnings. For no reason at all—except that you love them.
notes: Golden Sandal, Gajray Bonds, Lemon Crystals, Velvet Pearls
Each candle hand-poured and wrapped with care
Includes optional handwritten note—just tell us what to say
features: Custom bundle of your chosen candles
mood: Because the best gifts don’t just light up a room—they leave something glowing behind.
